explanation:
code_hardening: Added null checks for canvas, parent, and mDivider; early-returned on zero children and invalid parent vertical bounds; guarded against null child views; constrained divider bounds to the parent’s vertical drawing area.
resolve_compilation_errors: Kept this as a helper method without a RecyclerView.State parameter; no @Override annotation; used fully resolved existing types and fields from the class (RecyclerView.LayoutParams, mDivider).
exception_handling: none.
logic_customization: Changed from horizontal row separators to vertical column separators by computing a single vertical span using parent paddingTop and height minus paddingBottom; positioned each divider at child.getRight() plus rightMargin; used the drawable’s intrinsic height as the divider thickness (width); swapped left/right and top/bottom logic accordingly.
refactoring: Clarified variable names (parentTop, parentBottom, dividerLeft, dividerRight, dividerThickness); separated shared parent-bound calculations from per-child logic for readability.
misc: Updated inline comments to describe vertical divider behavior and ensured minimal, consistent formatting; no new custom API calls were introduced.
